name: Hands (JonathanKarni165)
description:
An online mobile game implementation of the game “chopsticks” (rules of the game - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chopsticks_(hand_game)).

My game is for 4 players instead of 2 to make things much for interesting and fun! The game is mostly a party game, but it also contains a rating competitive system.

And of course, there are several choices for each player to design his own unique hand with new skins and colors that can be purchased with in-game credits.
